author: Not available

text.0: Exaudi nos, deus salutaris noster, spes omnium finium terre et in mari longe.
text.1: Gehyr us, hælend god,           þu eart hiht ealra
text.2: þe on ðisse eorðan           utan syndon
text.3: oððe feor on sæ           foldum wuniað.

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
